price: Wala nyinyi hamtataka isipo kuwa atake Mwenyezi Mungu Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Na nyinyi hamwezi kutaka kitu ila anapo taka Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
